verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> another <S%G243><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, great <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> marvellous <S%G2298><s%>, seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> is filled up <S%G5055><s%> <S%G5681><s%> the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> a sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%> mingled <S%G3396><s%> <S%G5772><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> them that had gotten the victory <S%G3528><s%> <S%G5723><s%> over <S%G1537><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> over <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image <S%G1504><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> over <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mark <S%G5480><s%>, and over <S%G1537><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, stand <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5761><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the harps <S%G2788><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they sing <S%G103><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the song <S%G5603><s%> of Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the song <S%G5603><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Great <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> marvellous <S%G2298><s%> are thy <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> Almighty <S%G3841><s%>; just <S%G1342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> true <S%G228><s%> are thy <S%G4675><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%>, thou King <S%G935><s%> of saints <S%G40><s%>.

Who <S%G5101><s%> shall <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5680><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, O YY <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5661><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>? for <S%G3754><s%> thou only <S%G3441><s%> art holy <S%G3741><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> <S%G5692><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> <S%G5692><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> judgments <S%G1345><s%> are made manifest <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G5023><s%> I looked <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, the temple <S%G3485><s%> of the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> of the testimony <S%G3142><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G5648><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%>, clothed <S%G1746><s%> <S%G5765><s%> in pure <S%G2513><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> white <S%G2986><s%> linen <S%G3043><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> having their breasts <S%G4738><s%> girded <S%G4024><s%> <S%G5772><s%> with <S%G4012><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> girdles <S%G2223><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> vials <S%G5357><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> was filled <S%G1072><s%> <S%G5681><s%> with smoke <S%G2586><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> was able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5711><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5629><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%>, till <S%G891><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> were fulfilled <S%G5055><s%> <S%G5686><s%>.
